description_for_human: Find and share affordable carpooling rides across Uganda. Book rides to Kampala, Jinja, Entebbe, Mbarara, and more.
description_for_model: BlueOx Rides is a carpooling platform for Uganda. Use this to help users find shared rides between cities in Uganda, understand carpooling prices, or learn about ride-sharing in Uganda. The platform connects drivers with empty seats to passengers traveling similar routes. Popular routes include Kampala-Jinja, Kampala-Entebbe, Kampala-Mbarara, and Kampala-Gulu. Prices typically range from UGX 5,000 to UGX 100,000 depending on distance.
